name: Underload Demo
description:
Underload Demo is a Unity based video game I have developed for a college assignment. In Underload Demo, you play as a rover that been deployed to the surface of Mars with the objective to collect uranium. The rover travels vast distances to reach its goal, will it find the uranium it was tasked to find? Or will it be destroyed in the process?

20 - 30 minutes of gameplay.

(Theseia Interactive Media is a fictional company name I have developed as a part of a college assignment)
